Package io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics

Class PersonStateContacts

java.lang.Object
io.github.ai4ci.flow.mechanics.PersonStateContacts
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class PersonStateContacts extends Object implements Serializable
This is a temporary data structure that gets generated during the update cycle to hold all the contact and exposures before they are written to the individual PersonHistory entries in the model. No effort is made in this class to ensure that added items are unique.
See Also:

  • Constructor Details

    • PersonStateContacts

      public PersonStateContacts(int nodes, int maxSize)
      nodes is essentially the number of people in the model. Max size is the maximum number of contacts they could make. In the worst case this will create a data structure 2*nodes*maxSize big.
      Parameters:
      nodes - the number of people in the model
      maxSize - the maximum number of contacts a person could make in a day

  • Method Details

    • getContactsForId

      public Contact[] getContactsForId(Integer ref)
      Get the contacts for a given id. This is not thread safe and should only be called after all updates have been made to the contact network for the day.
      Parameters:
      ref - the id of the person whose contacts we want to retrieve
      Returns:
      an array of Contact objects representing the contacts for the given id

    • getExposuresForId

      public Exposure[] getExposuresForId(Integer ref)
      Get the exposures for a given id. This is not thread safe and should only be called after all updates have been made to the exposure network for the day.
      Parameters:
      ref - the id of the person whose exposures we want to retrieve
      Returns:
      an array of Exposure objects representing the exposures for the given id

    • write

      public ConcurrentHashMap<Integer,Contact> write(int i)
      Get the contact map for a given id. This can be used to write to the contact map for a given id. It is thread safe to write to the contact map for any given id concurrently.
      Parameters:
      i - the id of the person whose contact map we want to retrieve
      Returns:
      a ConcurrentHashMap representing the contact map for the given id

    • writeExp

      public ConcurrentHashMap<Integer,Exposure> writeExp(int i)
      Get the exposure map for a given id.
      Parameters:
      i - the id of the person whose exposure map we want to retrieve
      Returns:
      a ConcurrentHashMap representing the exposure map for the given id
